Interface TimoCloudBukkitAPI


  • public interface TimoCloudBukkitAPI
    Use TimoCloudBukkitAPI.getBukkitInstance() to work

      • setState

        void setState(java.lang.String state)
        Will be sent to TimoCloud BungeeCord
        Parameters:
        state - Any string, e.g. "ONLINE", "INGAME", "RESTARTING"

      • isRandomMap

        boolean isRandomMap()
        To enable random maps, please remove the folder base/templates/YOURGROUP and create directories like "YOURGROUP_VILLAGE" instead - they will be randomly chosen
        Returns:
        If server (map) was randomly chosen

      • getMapName

        java.lang.String getMapName()
        Returns:
        If map was randomly chosen, this will return the map name, if you call the template "YOURGROUP_VILLAGE", it will return VILLAGE. If you don't have multiple maps, it will return the defaultMapName set in config

      • getExtra

        java.lang.String getExtra()
        Returns:
        Current server extra

      • setExtra

        void setExtra(java.lang.String extra)
        Will be sent to TimoCloud BungeeCord
        Parameters:
        extra - Any string, maybe a map name?

      • getState

        java.lang.String getState(java.lang.String server)
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return OFFLINE

      • getMapName

        java.lang.String getMapName(java.lang.String server)
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers (randomly chosen?) map name

      • getExtra

        java.lang.String getExtra(java.lang.String server)
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers Extra - if not found, it will return an empty String ("")

      • getCurrentPlayers

        int getCurrentPlayers(java.lang.String server)
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return 0

      • getMaxPlayers

        int getMaxPlayers(java.lang.String server)
        Parameters:
        server - The servers name
        Returns:
        The servers state - if not found, it will return 0

      • getOnlineServersByGroup

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOnlineServersByGroup(java.lang.String group)
        Returns a list of server names registered in BungeeCord by TimoCloud. For example, you can use it to send a player to a random lobby server: Attention! When calling the first time, the method will return an empty list and will only add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method once you enable your plugin!
        Parameters:
        group - The server group (e.g. "Lobby")
        Returns:
        List of connected servers in this group

      • sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup

        void sendPlayerToRandomServerOfGroup(Player player,
                                     java.lang.String group)
        Sends a player to a random server of a given group. Attention! This calls the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group), so you have to be aware of the same thing as mentioned above: Calling the method the first time will not have any affect, just to add the group to the list of groups which should be queried. So call the method getOnlineServersByGroup(String group) when loading your plugin.
        Parameters:
        player - Player you want to send
        group - Group you want to randomly choose a server

      • sendCommandToBungeeCord

        void sendCommandToBungeeCord(java.lang.String command)
        Parameters:
        command - This command will be executed on BungeeCord
